long_desc.thetext:
The version of the "openssl" crate bundled in this package is vulnerable to CVE-2025-0977 / RUSTSEC-2025-0004.

c.f. https://rustsec.org/advisories/RUSTSEC-2025-0004.html

Reproducible: Always
